author: Dr15Jones
body:
The code was using an old format of the proc info system. This caused a parsing problem which caused the program to write lots of warnings. This should bring our code up to the linux 2.6 standard.
This fixes a problem seen in the CMSSW_6_2_X processing. We will need to back port this as well.
title: Updated ProcInfoFetcher to match linux 2.6 interface
